results.title: Trade (NP)
results.creator_credit: Ashley Schwall-Kearney, Craig Saunders, Monash University, ABC-TV (Australia) and Open Learning Agency of Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “The Global Economy”.
This first episode of the Open Learning economics course examines the changing international relations arising from the increasingly transglobal nature of financial markets. The first part of the episode examines general issues of international trade while the second focuses on the automobile industry in Australia and explores some of the pressures, issues and dynamics involved in restructuring a national industry to maximise competitiveness in international markets.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ashley Schwall-Kearney, Craig Saunders, Monash University, ABC-TV (Australia) and Open Learning Agency of Australia

results.title: Tractor sense
results.creator_credit: Patrick Pullen, John O'Neill and Technical and Scientific Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Safer Farming”.
Gives examples of three fatal accidents with tractors and explains how they could have been avoided if the tractors had been handled properly.

results.title: Tractor driving
results.brief_description: Very clearly this film gives hints on the maintenance, driving and safety precautions to be taken with a tractor. “A well maintained machine will be a safer machine and give you better value over its work life.”

results.title: Tracks on the Oregon trail
results.creator_credit: Christopher Riley and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Horizon”
Shows how strong government legislation has been largely responsible for the clean-up of Oregon’s rivers, roadside litter and air pollution problems.
Suitable for middle secondary level.

results.title: Tracks of the rainbow (A)
results.creator_credit: George Gittoes, Gabrielle Dalton and Gittoes and Dalton Productions
results.brief_description: The filmed journey of six Aboriginal teenagers as they travel from the southern urbanised areas of Australia, where memories of tribal life are disappearing, to the wild north of Australia in search of the traditional ways of their people. The Dreamtime Rainbow Serpent is their symbolic guide as they follow its epic tracks from Ayers Rock, north through Arnhem Land and across the sea to Melville Island.
results.creator_credit_for_label: George Gittoes, Gabrielle Dalton and Gittoes and Dalton Productions
results.description: The filmed journey of six Aboriginal teenagers as they travel from the southern urbanised areas of Australia, where memories of tribal life are disappearing, to the wild north of Australia in search of the traditional ways of their people. The Dreamtime Rainbow Serpent is their symbolic guide as they follow its epic tracks from Ayers Rock, north through Arnhem Land and across the sea to Melville Island.
description_for_label: The filmed journey of six Aboriginal teenagers as they travel from the southern urbanised areas of Australia, where memories of tribal life are disappearing, to the wild north of Australia in search of the traditional ways of their people. The Dreamtime Rainbow Serpent is their symbolic guide as they follow its epic tracks from Ayers Rock, north through Arnhem Land and across the sea to Melville Island.

results.title: Tracks of glory
results.creator_credit: Marcus Cole, Paul D. Barron, Damien Parer and Barron Films
results.brief_description: Starring Cameron Daddo, Phil Morris, Robert Vaughn and Nicholas Eadie, this is a story about two men from opposite ends of the earth; and their ideals, hopes and dreams. In 1903, two men are using their talents to win themselves a place in the sun. Don Walker, a champion Australian cyclist drags himself from the depths of urban poverty to the height of glory. He is a man determined to win on his own terms. American Marshall W. “Major” Taylor, a grandson of slaves, is a dedicated professional and the first black American athlete to smash his way through the colour bar. They have everything to lose and everything to win.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Marcus Cole, Paul D. Barron, Damien Parer and Barron Films
results.description: Starring Cameron Daddo, Phil Morris, Robert Vaughn and Nicholas Eadie, this is a story about two men from opposite ends of the earth; and their ideals, hopes and dreams. In 1903, two men are using their talents to win themselves a place in the sun. Don Walker, a champion Australian cyclist drags himself from the depths of urban poverty to the height of glory. He is a man determined to win on his own terms. American Marshall W. “Major” Taylor, a grandson of slaves, is a dedicated professional and the first black American athlete to smash his way through the colour bar. They have everything to lose and everything to win.
description_for_label: Starring Cameron Daddo, Phil Morris, Robert Vaughn and Nicholas Eadie, this is a story about two men from opposite ends of the earth; and their ideals, hopes and dreams. In 1903, two men are using their talents to win themselves a place in the sun. Don Walker, a champion Australian cyclist drags himself from the depths of urban poverty to the height of glory. He is a man determined to win on his own terms. American Marshall W. “Major” Taylor, a grandson of slaves, is a dedicated professional and the first black American athlete to smash his way through the colour bar. They have everything to lose and everything to win.

results.title: Tracks
results.brief_description: Accompanied only by her faithful dog and four camels, an Australian satisfies her craving for solitude by embarking on a solo trip across the desert from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean.

constellations_other.name: Directions of storytelling
constellations_other.description: Panoramic slides gave magic lanternists the ability to progress narratives by adjusting slides left or right. This movement is emblematic of a panning shot where the camera follows the action the natural way your head moves.

results.description: Accompanied only by her faithful dog and four camels, an Australian satisfies her craving for solitude by embarking on a solo trip across the desert from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean.
description_for_label: Accompanied only by her faithful dog and four camels, an Australian satisfies her craving for solitude by embarking on a solo trip across the desert from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean.

results.title: Tracks
results.creator_credit: Henry Jaglom, Ted Shapiro, Irving Cohen and Howard Zukor
results.brief_description: Sergeant Jack Falen (Dennis Hopper), an American soldier returning from Vietnam, is accompanying the coffined corpse of his best friend on a train ride across America. Arriving at the train he starts to make the acquaintance of some of the passengers, getting to know their personal habits and obsessions. Among the passengers is a young college student, Stephanie, to whom Falen is attracted. Gradually a series of strange occurrences unfold as Falen’s post-war nightmares surface. “Tracks” was one of the first films to deal with American conscience concerning Vietnam and is a film which constantly breaks societal perception of limitation in mind, body and spirit.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Henry Jaglom, Ted Shapiro, Irving Cohen and Howard Zukor

results.title: Tracker
results.creator_credit: Kent Nason, Rex Tasker and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A view from the cockpit of a VS880 Tracker aircraft patrolling Atlantic coastal waters and the eastern Arctic from its base in Shearwater, Nova Scotia. The film is a demonstration of the kind of peacetime missions served by the air arm of the Canadian Armed Forces in protecting territorial waters against illegal incursion and pollution, and in safe-guarding national sovereignty.

results.title: Track stars: the unseen heroes of movie sound
results.creator_credit: Terry Burke, Learning Corporation of America and Film Arts
results.brief_description: Split-screen technique is used to demonstrate how “track stars” - movie sound specialists - painstakingly match sounds to the action of the characters who are being filmed.
